name: Traffic Mania (Moo Cow News)
description:
When traffic lights do not work, driving is more dangerous then ever. People quit jobs that are far away from them, which means jobs are more of a problem. Only one brave person could stop this... YOU! Control traffic lights and make sure driving is not as dangerous as before. Can you do it?? Download the game and find out.

NOTE: This game is in early alpha so there may be bugs. If you find one, use the report a bug feature in game.

IF DOWNLOADING FROM ITCH CLIENT: You cannot launch the game from the client. It will open the installer. Check your app list to find the game.
